author: Hemant Mehta
title: Christian Hate-Pastor Tells Congregation How to Convert Hindus: Remind Them Their Lord is Satan
text:
In a lengthy sermon demonizing Hinduism, Christian Hate-Pastor Steven Anderson told his congregation that Hindu references to God in the Bhagavad Gita aren’t referring to the Christian God … they’re referring to Satan. 
The whole thing boils down to an angry man screaming about how other people believe a unicorn’s horn is longer than it really is. 
He later told his congregation how to witness to Hindus… by pointing to the Bible. The argument goes like this: Your imaginary friends don’t exist, because my imaginary friend said so! 
I’m sure Hindus everywhere are converting as we speak.
